WorkItem.Description:
Hello, on my Human Rogue(loaded from the armory) it's showing as if I had 33 expertise, but in-game I only got 31.
Tested it with non-maces/swords, looks like the racial is giving 5 expertise instead of 3, just thought I'd report it.

Comments.Message: Can you tell us your character name and server name? My initial tests show the bug to be different. I am seeing results on v2.2.23 that the 3 pts racial bonus is not being applied at all. I base this assertion on doing some random samples of lvl 80 human rogues carrying swords that I find in the armory against their non-sword wielding brethren. To state the obvious: my tests showed the non-sword wielding rogues had the same expertise value in Rawr and Armory. Sword wielding human rogues had a 3 pt difference between Rawr and Armory.
Please post the character file where this is occurring so I can check it out

I retract my previous comment. I didn't realize that the tooltip of base expertise shows the main hand and off hand expertise values. In finding that fact, I did validate your statement that Rawr is indeed adding 5 pts instead of 3pts. It is also only adding them for one-handed maces and swords only.
